_header: O High Father of heaven bliss
_description: James Ryman, A prayer to God in Trinity — four quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Miserere nobis’ and burden: ‘Pater de celis deus / Miserere nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O highe ffader of heuen blysSith crist thy sone our broder
                    is…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …As thou art lorde of euery costMiserere nobis
